Name: Brawler
Details: EXPERTISE: Guts A resilient fighter with crippling Melee attacks via Juggernaut and improved handling of Heat generation. Capable of standing their ground more effectively through Bulwark and able to suffer additional injuries before being incapacitated. Can also better control recoil effects from weapons. SPECIALIZATION: Piloting Skilled in handling a 'Mech and avoiding damage through the use of Evasive Move, and better at hitting with Melee attacks. Has an increased threshold at which piloted 'Mechs become UNSTEADY.
